The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 06 November is 6,506 (753 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 November, there were 824 new confirmed cases (95.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 October, there were 721 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 14% ( 103 extra cases).
